verses.roman:
tāṅ-sabāre kṛpā kari' prabhu ta' calilā
seita pāṭhāna saba 'vairāgī' ha-ilā

synonyms: tāṅ-sabāre—to all of them; kṛpā kari'-bestowing mercy; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ta'-indeed; calilā—departed; seita—they; pāṭhāna—the Mohammedans of the Pāṭhāna community; saba—all; vairāgī ha-ilā—became mendicants.
translation: Bestowing His mercy upon them in this way, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu left. All the Pāṭhāna Mohammedans then became mendicants.
